import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ServiceService } from 'src/app/service/service.service'; export interface inciedentdata { incident_type: string; time: string; date: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'], }) export class SidebarComponent { incidentDataArray: inciedentdata[] = []; searchText: string = ''; constructor(private router: Router, private service: ServiceService) {} ngOnInit() { this.service.getIncedeentData().subscribe((incidentData: any) => { this.incidentDataArray = incidentData.incidents ; console.log('incidentData', this.incidentDataArray); }); } onclickLogout() { this.router.navigate(['/login']); } filteredData() { if (!this.searchText) { return this.incidentDataArray; } return this.incidentDataArray.filter(item => Object.values(item).some(val => val.toString().toLowerCase().includes(this.searchText.toLowerCase()) ) ); } }
